system.description: At 17th level you become a true harbinger of death. You ignore necrotic resistance and treat immunity to necrotic damage as resistance. In addition, you add the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.f64g6d7u9y9wxfij]{Circle of Death} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.j8fzqjvq0ht2z1y0]{Finger of Death} spells to your list of Necropomp spells.
